WorkItem.ClosedComment: The fix should be visible in the upcoming release. Thanks!

Comments.Message: Please God make it a bug
Type parameters have to be positional. surely!
I can't extend X to add type parameters.
I mean "I shouldn't be able to extend X to add type parameters".

Definitely a bug. Spec section 7.2:

    When a generic interface has multiple declarations, all declarations must have identical type parameter lists, i.e. identical type parameter names with identical constraints in identical order.
